text: 27.29: Sng 69.19; Ais 53.3Mbe shaa hɨvar ana sharav, mbara tari ki karɨga mbe ndiga zav, ŋgui vhɨrve gari guman pan fi khorsɨga fara muuŋgi khorsɨga muuŋgiap, ana panan fagi. Mbe khorar ana fav vurun sɨgɨma ndiga za, ana guva haren suirigi. Mbe maaŋ ana muuŋgiap, mbara wari wo thɨpani phɨrav, ana nɨman fav, ana nzɨɨav khaŋ ana nzuai, “Raar vhuuŋ, Zudaiŋ ŋguir vhɨrve gari guman pan.” 27.29 Mba ntari ga mbui gɨɨtɨvi, mbe Zisasan sunu zav, ŋgui vhɨrve gari guman pana nzɨɨ sɨɨŋmbarar ana muuŋgi. Mba tugivigen, ŋgu vhɨrve gari gumgir pani kha sɨɨŋmbara mbui. Mbe shagi hɨvi sharav ŋgui vhɨrve gari gumgir pani fi khorshɨgir fi. Mbe mba sɨɨaŋ muuŋgiap ŋgui vhɨrve gari guman pan pigi mpirmpirɨga perav, mbe sɨga suigiap piigi.
